pr_title: Added item expiration to AggregationDataStore cache

timeline.message: Added item expiration to AggregationDataStore cache

timeline.body:
Will the null case happen when a cache query is not provided?

Would something like this help with debugging?
```suggestion
                tableVersion = tableVersion == null ? "__UNSET_TABLE_VERSION__" : tableVersion;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Will the null case happen when a cache query is not provided?

Would something like this help with debugging?

Suggested change
tableVersion = tableVersion == null ? "" : tableVersion;
tableVersion = tableVersion == null ? "__UNSET_TABLE_VERSION__" : tableVersion;
timeline.author: jkusa

replies.bodyText: null happens when no VersionQuery annotation exists.  The ";" I feel is sufficient to know there was nothing set.
replies.author: aklish
